question: People feel that educational success is dependent on having a good teacher, others say it depends not the attitude of the student. Discuss both side and state your opinion*
text: the chart above explaining about the export earnings between 2015 and 2016 and the percentage of each category compared with every year. Overall we can see that from 2015 to 2016 there had been a gradual increase.

to begin with there are various categories of exports from the highest to the lowest bring in 2015-2016. The first thing we can notice is that the values percentage of petroleum products gained a tiny fraction, in spite of, it had collecting value the most of all export list in 2015-2016. Furthermore, engineered goods and textiles had rapidly grown from others, particularly textiles despite it being the least, however it had significantly increased from 2015 to 2016 and was up to more than 15%.

Moreover, there has been an increase in agricultural products even though it was being the least growth. On the other hand, after looking at those four items there has been a slightly different in gems and jewellery which dip up to 5.18% from 2015.

To summarize, the highest earnings value of it was still from petroleum products and looking at the peak of other items there was an opportunity for two kinds of export such as engineered goods and textiles to contribute more in the future.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase however. Consider adding a comma.
